section.name: About PrefCount.
section.p: PrefCount is an application that assists with counting up the results of a game of Preferance (also Preference, or Preferans). If you don't play Preferance, this application will do no good for you. By the way, Preferance is an old card game that originated in Russia in the middle of the XIX century and is still widely played across Central Europe and Russia.
PrefCount is written in Java 1.5 and runs perfectly on multiple platforms: Windows , Mac , and Linux .
